howToUse: Step 1: Plug the hair dryer into the power socket.
Step 2: Select the heat setting using the dial.
Step 3: Dry your hair by directing the nozzle at the roots.
maintenance: Turn off the device after use.
Store it in a dry place when not in use.
troubleshooting: If the hair dryer isn't turning on, check if it's properly plugged in.
If it overheats, allow it to cool down before use.

howToUse: Step 1: Plug in the straightener and select the desired heat setting.
Step 2: Divide your hair into sections and slowly glide the straightener through each section.
maintenance: Keep the plates clean by wiping them with a damp cloth.
Store in a dry place when not in use.
troubleshooting: If the straightener isn't heating, check the power cable.
If it gets too hot, allow it to cool down before using again.

Step 3: Press the nozzle to spray the liquid.

howToUse: Step 1: Fill the water tank with distilled water.
Step 2: Turn on the steamer and wait for it to heat up.
Step 3: Hold your face about 6-8 inches away from the steam for 5-10 minutes.
maintenance: Empty the water tank after every use.
Clean the steamer regularly to prevent mineral buildup.
troubleshooting: If the steamer isn't producing steam, ensure the tank is filled with water.
If the steam is weak, clean the water tank and nozzle.

howToUse: Step 1: Place the spa cap on your head and adjust it for a snug fit.
Step 2: Turn on the heat settings if applicable.
Step 3: Use for the recommended duration as per the product instructions.
maintenance: Clean the spa cap after every use to remove any residue.
Avoid submerging the electrical parts in water.
troubleshooting: If the spa cap isn't heating, check if the power source is connected.
If there is no steam, make sure the water tank is filled properly.
